ShortDescription.Value: Easy change max sizes of all Transit Passengers and Depot vehicles

Publish.LongDescription:
### Dispatch Boss
### What it does
- **Depots**: change maximum vehicles per Depot (Bus, Taxi, Tram, Train, Subway) - **Passengers**: increase how many passengers each vehicle can carry (bus, tram, trains, subway, airplane, ship, ferry) - **Sliders** adjust any time, no restart needed. - Supports switching cities.
### Notes 🚍🚋🚆✈️🚢 - Depot capacity = maximum number of vehicles a single depot can maintain or spawn (scales off base building, not extensions). - Passenger capacity = maximum passengers each vehicle can carry. - Remove other depot/passenger capacity mods to avoid conflicts (they override each other). - Does not use Harmony or Reflection; more compatible - less likely to break with game updates. - Safe to remove any time. Use reset all button to run as vanilla game default.
## 11 Languages
- English, Français, Deutsch German, Español Spanish, Italiano Italian - 한국어 Korean, 日本語 Japanese, 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese) - 繁體中文 Traditional Chinese, Português Brazilian, Polski Polish
### Credits - River-Mochi: author and maintainer - yenyang: code review and technical advice - Inspired by Wayz's original Depot Capacity Changer. - Necko1996: testing - BugsyG: testing - StarQ for technical advice
